name: Fly Away (itch) (NotShxde)
description:
Fly Away

Made For Wowie Game Jam 4.0 Hosted by Jonas Tyroller

An Epic Game Consisting Of Platforms, Dialogues, Jokes and Levitation

Controls

You Can Use Both D-Pad and WASD  For Controlling The Game

[A] - Move Left

[S] - Downroll

[D] - Move Right

[LMB] - Attack(No Functionality )

[RMB] - Punch (No Functionality )

[S/D] + [LMB] - HOLD( I dont Know what to name figure the name for yourself)

[SPACE] - Jump

[SPACE] *2 - Double Jump

I Hope all Of You Enjoyed My Game, If Possible Please Leave A Review And Comment Which Will Help Me A Lot

"FlyAwayPatronum" -Merlin (A.I)
